languages.text: When shooting with {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g} in the back, both the damage dealt and the bonus given are doubled.

traits.locale_text: When shooting with {g|f:cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}At All Costs!{/g} in the back, both the damage dealt and the bonus given are doubled.

languages.text: Когда комиссар использует {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g}, стреляя из-за спины, получаемые от способности эффекты удваиваются.
When the Commissar uses {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} while shooting from behind, the bonuses granted by the effect are doubled.
languages.original_text: Когда комиссар использует {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g}, стреляя из-за спины, получаемые от способности эффекты удваиваются.

traits.locale_text: When the Commissar uses {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} while shooting from behind, the bonuses granted by the effect are doubled.

languages.text: Setzt der Kommissar {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Um jeden Preis!{/g} ein, während er von hinten feuert, werden die durch den Effekt gewährten Boni verdoppelt.
languages.original_text: When the Commissar uses {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} while shooting from behind, the bonuses granted by the effect are doubled.

languages.text: Quand le commissaire utilise {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Coûte que coûte !{/g} et qu'il tire dans le dos, les bonus de l'effet sont doublés.
languages.original_text: When the Commissar uses {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} while shooting from behind, the bonuses granted by the effect are doubled.

traits.locale_text: Quand le commissaire utilise {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Coûte que coûte !{/g} et qu'il tire dans le dos, les bonus de l'effet sont doublés.

languages.text: 当政委使用{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}排除万难！{/g}从盟友后方射击时，此能力带来的加成效果翻倍。

languages.text: Cuando el comisario usa {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}¡A cualquier precio!{/g} disparando desde la retaguardia, se duplican las bonificaciones otorgadas por su efecto.
languages.original_text: When the Commissar uses {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} while shooting from behind, the bonuses granted by the effect are doubled.

languages.text: コミッサーが背後から{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}どんな犠牲を払っても！{/g}を使用すると、その効果によって得られるボーナスは2倍になる。
